messages.subject: Re: HAVE YOUR SAY IN TIME MAGAZINE
messages.msgSnippet: Count us in as being adamently opposed to genetically-modified foods. Here on Canada s prairie, we ve seen the nightmare associated with so-called super
messages.messageBody:
Count us in as being adamently opposed to genetically-modified foods.
Here on Canada's prairie, we've seen the nightmare associated with
so-called "super canola". Talk about a time-bomb...
Sonia
Saskatchewan, Canada
